job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWere hiring strongSenior Machine Learning Engineersstrong with expertise in data science and predictive statistics analytics and modeling Because you will be working with medical and biological datasets some background in biomedical sciences is ideal A deep background in Bayesian methods is highly desirable as is fluency in RppbrppPlease notice that this is not a financialsector job thanks However if youre looking for a challenging deeply rewarding position applying advanced machine learning to help solve some of humanitys toughest problems then this job may be for youppbrppstrongWith ICR youll get tostrongppbrpulliApply cuttingedge machine learning techniques to detect human agerelated diseases as early as possibleliliLead a team that is trying to redefine personalized preventive and regenerative medicineliliUse your creativity to solve challenging problemsliulpbrppstrongYoull also needstrongppbrpulliThe ability to work in the United States without sponsorshipliliA cando attitude and a friendly easygoing personalityliulpbrppPosition title and compensation are commensurate with experienceppstrongThe compensation ranges listed below are emstarting emrangesstrongppbrppstrongStarting base pay range 155000yr  225000yrstrongppstrongStarting additional compensation range 12500yr  27500yrstrongp
